Title: Is J.J. Watt’s decision taking this much time a good or bad sign for the Browns? Hey, Mary Kay!
Description: Is it good for the Browns that J.J. Watt is taking so long to make his decision? Hey, good for him. This is his first foray into this sort of thing in the NFL and choosing where you’re going to live and play is a big decision,
Author: Cleveland.com on MSN.com
